bibl.title: Hellenistic Royal Symposia.
bibl.note: "The ideal version of a Hellenistic royal symposion is of course that portrayed in the letter of Aristeas to Philocrates on the Septuagint translation of the Torah."
bibl.seg: Per BILDE, Troels ENGBERG-PEDERSEN, Lise HANNESTAD and Jan ZAHLE (Edd.), Aspects of Hellenistic Kingship = Studies in Hellenistic Civilization. VII (Aarhus, 1996) pp. 15-27.
"The ideal version of a Hellenistic royal symposion is of course that portrayed in the letter of Aristeas to Philocrates on the Septuagint translation of the Torah."
